document.full_text: libyan forces loyal to col. muammar el-qaddafi pressed a ground attack on ajdabiya, bringing the battle with the opposition back to the doorstep of the strategically vital rebel city.
document.title: as qaddafi's troops move in, a seesaw battle for rebel city
lines_and_colors: libyan forces loyal to col. muammar el-qaddafi pressed a ground attack on ajdabiya, bringing the battle with the opposition back to the doorstep of the strategically vital rebel city.
